headline: Who Will Win Guyana's Oil? Chevron and ExxonMobil Face Off
summary: XOM and CVX battle in arbitration over Hess' stake in Guyana's oil-rich Stabroek Block, with 11B barrels and industry influence on the line.

headline: Chevron May Receive Limited Maintenance License for Venezuela
summary: CVX is set to receive a minimal license for safety-only work in Venezuela as U.S. policy shifts back to stricter Trump-era sanctions.

raw.headline: Chevron May Receive Limited Maintenance License for Venezuela

headline: Chevron Earnings Slide, But Guyana Oilfield May Fuel 2026 Rally
summary: Chevron's disciplined capital allocation and Guyana assets make it resilient and attractive despite recent earnings pressure and oil price volatility. Learn more on CVX stock here.
